# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(s)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) >= text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        append!(current_line, word * ' ')
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

# Example Usage

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello world this is a very long sentence that will be wrapped into multiple lines by the function.")
"Hello world\nthis is a very long sentence that will be\nwrapped into multiple lines by the function."
```
